name: Kim's Diner
description:
FULL SCREEN MODE NECESSARY

The Henchmen and the Golddiggers are two intergalactic gangs who participate in human trafficking. Kim's diner is a neutral area for the gangs to settle their turf war through the peaceful means of karaoke. 

In this narrative text adventure, you will play as Kim, managing the shenanigans happening in her diner. Your actions have the ability to sway the outcome of the turf war in either directions: or even better, in the favor of human rebellion. But don't get too suspicious, or the only outcome waiting you will be an untimely death. 

Credits, in alphabetical order:

Tieren Costello - Co-writer, Co-designer

Ayca Durmus - Project Management, Co-writer, Co-designer

Kjell Hedgard Hugaas - Narrative Designer

Bridget Pivac - Narrative Designer

Dani-Alys Rizal - Narrative Programming, Story Structure Assistance
